statements: SELECT * FROM lighting_preferences WHERE user_id = 123;
SELECT user_id, schedule_id, brightness FROM lighting_preferences WHERE brightness > 50;
SELECT user_id, brightness FROM lighting_preferences WHERE schedule_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM lighting_preferences WHERE color_temperature < 4000 ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, brightness, color_temperature FROM lighting_preferences WHERE schedule_id IS NOT NULL;
SELECT * FROM lighting_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, brightness FROM lighting_preferences WHERE color_temperature > 5000;
SELECT user_id, schedule_id FROM lighting_preferences ORDER BY color_temperature DESC;
SELECT user_id, brightness, color_temperature FROM lighting_preferences WHERE brightness < 50 AND color_temperature BETWEEN 3000 AND 6000;
SELECT DISTINCT schedule_id FROM lighting_preferences WHERE user_id IN (1, 2, 3);
SELECT * FROM users_preferences;
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule FROM users_preferences ORDER BY user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM automation_routines WHERE active = TRUE;
SELECT routine_name, routine_description FROM automation_routines WHERE routine_id = '1234';
SELECT user_id, routine_name, active FROM automation_routines WHERE user_id = '9876' AND active = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM automation_routines WHERE active = true;
SELECT routine_name, routine_description FROM automation_routines WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule->'room1' as room1_schedule FROM users_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001';
SELECT routine_name, routine_description FROM automation_routines WHERE active = false ORDER BY routine_name DESC;
SELECT user_id, lighting_settings->'room2' as room2_settings FROM users_preferences WHERE user_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174002';
SELECT * FROM users_preferences;
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule FROM users_preferences;
SELECT schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM lighting_schedules;
SELECT * FROM automation_routines WHERE routine_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule, lighting_settings FROM users_preferences;
SELECT * FROM users_preferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule FROM users_preferences WHERE lighting_schedule = 'Default';
SELECT * FROM lighting_schedules WHERE start_time < '12:00:00';
SELECT routine_name, trigger_event FROM automation_routines WHERE action = 'Dim Lights';
SELECT users_preferences.*, automation_routines.routine_name FROM users_preferences INNER JOIN automation_routines ON users_preferences.user_id = 2 AND automation_routines.routine_id = 1;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT schedule_id, schedule_name, start_time, end_time FROM LightingSchedules ORDER BY schedule_name DESC;
SELECT setting_name, brightness_level FROM LightingSettings WHERE brightness_level > 50;
SELECT * FROM AutomationRoutines WHERE routine_name LIKE '%night%';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT * FROM LightingSchedules WHERE schedule_name = 'Bedroom';
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule FROM UserPreferences WHERE user_id = 1;
SELECT setting_name, brightness_level, color_temperature FROM LightingSettings WHERE brightness_level > 50;
SELECT routine_name, trigger_event, action FROM AutomationRoutines WHERE trigger_event = 'Motion Detected';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT user_id, lighting_schedule FROM UserPreferences WHERE lighting_intensity > 50;
SELECT lighting_color, lighting_intensity FROM UserPreferences ORDER BY lighting_intensity DESC;
SELECT schedule_name, day_of_week FROM ScheduleDetails WHERE is_active = TRUE;
SELECT DISTINCT user_id, schedule_id FROM UserSettings;
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences;
SELECT lighting_schedule, lighting_intensity FROM UserPreferences WHERE lighting_intensity > 50;
SELECT user_id, lighting_color FROM UserPreferences WHERE lighting_intensity < 30 AND lighting_color = 'blue';
SELECT * FROM UserPreferences JOIN UserSettings ON UserPreferences.user_id = UserSettings.user_id WHERE UserSettings.preferred_brightness > 70;
SELECT schedule_name, day_of_week FROM ScheduleDetails WHERE is_active = TRUE ORDER BY schedule_name DESC;
